Views¶

class lims.views.AjaxableResponseMixin[source]¶

Mixin to add AJAX support to a form. Must be used with an object-based FormView (e.g. CreateView)

class lims.views.OwnerRequiredMixin[source]¶

Mixin to limit access to the owner of an object (or superusers). Must be used with an object-based View (e.g. DetailView, EditView)

class lims.views.Tex2PdfMixin[source]¶

Mixin to create a .pdf file from a LaTeX template.

lims.ajax_views.create_png(filename, output, brightness, resolution=(1024, 1024))[source]¶

Generate png in output using filename as input with specified brightness and resolution. default resolution is 1024x1024 creates a directory for output if none exists :param filename: Image File (e.g. filename.img, filename.cbf) :param output: PNG Image Filename :param brightness: float (1.5=dark; -0.5=light) :param resolution: output size :return: PNG Image

lims.ajax_views.load_image(filename, gamma_offset=0.0, resolution=(1024, 1024))[source]¶

Read file and return an PIL image of desired resolution histogram stretched by the requested gamma_offset :param filename: Image File (e.g. filename.img, filename.cbf) :param gamma_offset: default 0.0 :param resolution: output size :return: resized PIL image
